thread.title: Per City of Brookings Sign Code Garage Sale Signs
thread.title_full: Per City of Brookings Sign Code Garage Sale Signs

title: Per City of Brookings Sign Code Garage Sale Signs
text:
Per City of Brookings Sign Code Garage Sale Signs ad date: 10/24/2015 
Sign Code Garage Sale Signs shall not exceed 4 sq. ft. in area and be displayed during sale hours only. Each property may not have more than 3 garage sales per calendar year and sale may not exceed 3 days in duration. Signs do not require a permit but must be located on private property. It is not allowed for signs to be placed on any public utility pole, light pole, traffic control device, on any public property or be located in any street right-of-way. Fore more information please refer to: City of Brookings Municipal Code Chapter 17.88 Signs* or call the City of Brookings 541-469-2163
